title: WHAT IS WRONG WITH PBE
body: every time i try to go to the pbe website it sends me straight to an error: 500, is the website down or what?

replies.body:
For the last two days I haven't been able to log into the PBE **forum** but I have no problem with logging in to the regular site.  How do I fix this? Everything in my PBE client works, I've been able to try out the new champs but I can't leave any feedback :'(
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Yeah, there was an issue for some players accessing the PBE site.  It's currently down for maintenance per the [status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  I don't have any eta's right now, but bookmark that page as updates roll out.  Hang tight!
having the same issue, will just have to wait and see if they fix it.
